name: Central Fugitive
description:
Time for some spin control. 

What is Central Fugitive? 

It is...

  • A game about escaping constantly rotating mazes!
  • An experiment in mastering coordination instead of controls!
  • A story about a thief and a genie!
  • Basically one of those astronaut tests where you get super disoriented!
  • Almost definitely a bad idea!
